com.github.xemiru.general.misc

Interface HelpGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultHelpGenerator

    public interface HelpGenerator
    Object managing messages generated by help commands.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  HelpGenerator.HelpInfo
      Databag class for information useful to a help command.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CommandException createError(CommandContext ctx, String input)
      Creates a CommandException to be thrown when the queried command crashes during information harvesting.
      CommandException createErrorUnknown(CommandContext ctx, String input)
      Creates a CommandException to be thrown when provided with an unknown command.

      Returns the amount of items to be shown in a page.

      Returns the sorting method used to organize commands prior to pagination.

      Sends help text.

    • Method Detail

      • getPageSize

        int getPageSize(CommandContext context)
        Returns the amount of items to be shown in a page.

        Use 0 or a negative number to disable pagination for calls to sendHelp(CommandContext, TreeMap, int, int). The method will always receive 0 as the requested and max page if this is disabled.

        The value can be adapted based on the provided context.

        Parameters:
        context - the context executing the help command
        Returns:
        the amount of items to be shown in a help page

      • getSorter

        Comparator<String> getSorter(CommandContext context)
        Returns the sorting method used to organize commands prior to pagination.

        The comparator can be adapted based on the provided context.

        Parameters:
        context - the context executing the help command
        Returns:
        the comparator used to sort entries when providing commands with short descriptions (a call to sendHelp(CommandContext, TreeMap, int, int)

      • sendHelp

        void sendHelp(CommandContext context,
              TreeMap<String,Optional<String>> help,
              int page,
              int maxPage)
        Sends help text.

        Items within the passed map are already the product of pagination; one does not need the page parameter to perform it themselves. The page and maxPage parameters exists purely to be able to relay such information back to the user.

        It is possible to receive an empty map if the user attempts to provide a page out of bounds.

        Parameters:
        context - the context executing the help command
        help - the mapping of command names to short descriptions
        page - the requested page
        maxPage - the max page

      • sendFullHelp

        void sendFullHelp(CommandContext context,
                  HelpGenerator.HelpInfo info)
        Sends help text for a specific command, held by the provided HelpGenerator.HelpInfo object.
        Parameters:
        context - the context executing the help command
        info - the HelpInfo object for the requested command

      • createError

        CommandException createError(CommandContext ctx,
                             String input)
        Creates a CommandException to be thrown when the queried command crashes during information harvesting.
        Parameters:
        ctx - the context executing the help command
        input - the input matching the crashing command
        Returns:
        a CommandException to be thrown

      • createErrorUnknown

        CommandException createErrorUnknown(CommandContext ctx,
                                    String input)
        Creates a CommandException to be thrown when provided with an unknown command.
        Parameters:
        ctx - the context executing the help command
        input - the input deemed as an unknown command reference
        Returns:
        a CommandException to be thrown
